bike.description: Triple-butted 6061 aluminum with hydro-formed top and down tube, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, taper gauge "S" bend stays, 34.9mm seat tube, disc brake mounts, replaceable derailleur hanger and seatstay rack mounts

components.description: SR/Suntour SF13-NCX-E LO LITE, hydraulic speed-lock and fixed rebound. magnesium lowers, 63mm travel, post mount
Alex DC25 disc specific double wall alloy rims, 32H, Formula alloy disc hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Shimano Deore RD-M591 SGS rear and Acera FD-M360 bottom pull front
Full alloy platform, toe clip attachable
Tektro Draco post mount hydraulic disc brakes with 160mm 6-Bolt wave rotors and Tektro brake levers
Jamis Riser bar, 6061 double-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 20mm rise x 10JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 600mm
Jamis adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm. ATS shim length 100mm
Anatomic double density kraton grip with gel and end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 31.6 x 350mm alloy clamp with QR seatpin
Selle San Marco ERA Glamour with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
